code: import React from'react';import'../styles/Projects.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const projects=[{title:'AI based Smart Interview Preparation App (PrepSmart)',technologies:['ReactJS','NodeJS','CSS'],description:'Designed and developed a scalable smart interview preparation platform.
